account.name: Konto
account.colorCodeDesc: Your color code is a code unique to you, and cannot be modified or changed.
account.uniqueCodeDesc: If you signed up via Twitter, please screenshot or copy and paste this code and send it to a MakoTools admin to move your username to a new, email verified MakoTools account.
account.usernameErrorAlphanumeric: Username must only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters or underscores!
account.usernameErrorUnderscore: Username cannot start or end with an underscore!
account.emailNotVerified: Your email has not been verified.
